start.text: You're standing on the side of a dusty road on Earth, {name}. A strange spaceship hums above you. A hatch opens.

spaceship.text: You step inside and are greeted by a sarcastic robot. He offers you a seat.

run_away.text: You run down the road. A massive shadow blocks the sky — Earth is being demolished.

b.desc: Lie down and accept your fate.

galaxy_jump.text: You warp into deep space and find yourself near a bizarre, bureaucratic alien planet.

airlock.text: The robot glares and presses a button. You’re sucked into the vacuum of space.

crushed.text: A construction fleet demolishes Earth. You are no more. Should have gotten on the ship.

alien_bureaucracy.text: You're forced to fill out 42 forms before being allowed to breathe. You die of paperwork. Or do you?

black_hole.text: You dodge the planet but get pulled into a black hole. Strangely peaceful, really.

paperwork_escape.text: Your forged documents get you access to the elite alien lounge. A portal opens behind the bar.

alien_arrest.text: The supervisor turns out to be an AI judge. You are found guilty of sarcasm and sentenced to eternal community service.

zen_singularity.text: You merge with the quantum consciousness. Everything makes sense, briefly. Then you cease to exist.

wormhole_escape.text: You barely escape through a wormhole and land in a dimension made entirely of cats.

quantum_pub.text: You’re served a drink that exists in all states simultaneously. You both enjoy it and regret it.

galactic_chase.text: Security drones chase you through 5 solar systems. You escape… but now you're the most wanted lifeform in the galaxy.

cat_god.text: The cats crown you their god. You live forever in a palace of purring and existential dread.

cat_scratch_fever.text: The cats attack. Turns out they don’t like being disrespected. You die buried in fluff and claws.
